verses.verse: And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

And there was a <S%H259>certain<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H6881>Zorah,<s%> of the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1839>Danites,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4495>Manoah;<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%> was <S%H6135>barren,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> not.

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to the <S%H802>woman,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H2009>Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> you are <S%H6135>barren,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> not: but you shall <S%H2029>conceive,<s%> and <S%H3205>bear<s%> a <S%H1121>son.<s%>

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore <S%H8104>beware,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, and <S%H8354>drink<s%> not <S%H3196>wine<s%> nor strong <S%H7941>drink,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> not <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H2931>unclean<s%> thing:

For, <S%H2009>see,<s%> you shall <S%H2030>conceive,<s%> and <S%H3205>bear<s%> a <S%H1121>son;<s%> and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4177>razor<s%> shall <S%H5927>come<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> his <S%H7218>head:<s%> for the <S%H5288>child<s%> shall be a <S%H5139>Nazarite<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%> from the <S%H990>womb:<s%> and he shall <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H3467>deliver<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

Then the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H559>told<s%> her <S%H376>husband,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> A <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to me, and his <S%H4758>countenance<s%> was like the <S%H4758>countenance<s%> of an <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3372>terrible:<s%> but I <S%H7592>asked<s%> him not from <S%H335>where<s%> <S%H2088><s%> he was, <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> he me his <S%H8034>name:<s%>

But he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> you shall <S%H2030>conceive,<s%> and <S%H3205>bear<s%> a <S%H1121>son;<s%> and <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H7941>drink<s%> <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> nor strong <S%H8354>drink,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H2932>unclean<s%> thing: for the <S%H5288>child<s%> shall be a <S%H5139>Nazarite<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%> from the <S%H990>womb<s%> to the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H4194>death.<s%>

Then <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H6279>entreated<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> O my <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> let the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you did <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> to us, and <S%H3384>teach<s%> us <S%H4100>what<s%> we shall <S%H6213>do<s%> to the <S%H5288>child<s%> that shall be <S%H3205>born.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H4495>Manoah;<s%> and the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> to the <S%H802>woman<s%> as she <S%H3427>sat<s%> in the <S%H7704>field:<s%> but <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> was not with her.

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> made <S%H4116>haste,<s%> and <S%H7323>ran,<s%> and <S%H5046>showed<s%> her <S%H376>husband,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> has <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to me, that <S%H935>came<s%> to me the other <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H376>man,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, Are you the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H802>woman?<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> I am.

And <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6258>Now<s%> let your <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H935>pass.<s%> <S%H4100>How<s%> shall we <S%H4941>order<s%> the <S%H5288>child,<s%> and how shall we <S%H6213>do<s%> to him?
And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4495>Manoah,<s%> Of <S%H3605>all<s%> that I <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H802>woman<s%> let her <S%H8104>beware.<s%>

She may not <S%H398>eat<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> thing that <S%H3318>comes<s%> of the <S%H1612>vine,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> let her <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> or strong <S%H7941>drink,<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H2932>unclean<s%> thing: <S%H3605>all<s%> that I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> her let her <S%H8104>observe.<s%>

And <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, let us <S%H6113>detain<s%> you, <S%H5704>until<s%> we shall have <S%H6213>made<s%> ready a <S%H1423>kid<s%> <S%H5795><s%> for you.

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4495>Manoah,<s%> <S%H518>Though<s%> you <S%H6113>detain<s%> me, I will not <S%H398>eat<s%> of your <S%H3899>bread:<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> you will <S%H6213>offer<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, you must <S%H5927>offer<s%> it to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%> For <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> not that he was an <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H4310>What<s%> is your <S%H8034>name,<s%> that <S%H3588>when<s%> your <S%H1697>sayings<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H935>pass<s%> we may do you <S%H3513>honor?<s%>
And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4100>Why<s%> <S%H7592>ask<s%> you <S%H2088>thus<s%> after my <S%H8034>name,<s%> seeing it is <S%H6383>secret?<s%>

So <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H1423>kid<s%> <S%H5795><s%> with a meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> it on a <S%H6697>rock<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and the angel <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H6381>wondrously;<s%> and <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H7200>looked<s%> on.

For it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when the <S%H3851>flame<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up toward <S%H8064>heaven<s%> from <S%H5921>off<s%> the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> that the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5927>ascended<s%> in the <S%H3851>flame<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%> And <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H7200>looked<s%> on it, and <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> their <S%H6440>faces<s%> to the <S%H776>ground.<s%>

But the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> did <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H7200>appear<s%> to <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> and to his <S%H802>wife.<s%> <S%H227>Then<s%> <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> that he was an <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H802>wife,<s%> We shall surely <S%H4191>die,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> we have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>

But his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3863>If<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> were <S%H2654>pleased<s%> to <S%H4191>kill<s%> us, he would not have <S%H3947>received<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H4503>offering<s%> and a meat offering at our <S%H3027>hands,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> would he have <S%H7200>showed<s%> us <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> would as at this <S%H6256>time<s%> have <S%H8085>told<s%> us such <S%H1697>things<s%> as <S%H2063>these.<s%>

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8123>Samson:<s%> and the <S%H5288>child<s%> <S%H1431>grew,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him.

And the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H6470>move<s%> him at times in the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H6881>Zorah<s%> and <S%H847>Eshtaol.<s%>
